name: Jelly Maker Cooking Class
description:
Make AMAZING jellies in this DELICIOUS food-making game! With plenty of flavors, toppings, and shapes to choose from, you’ll have countless hours of fun creating your favorite treat! 100% FUN for kids!

“This app is so delicious you'll want to make the real stuff!”

GAME FEATURES:

•Amazing Jellies!
•Mouth-watering flavours
•Choose your favourite jelly toppings!
•Loads of tasty and lovely toppings
•Beautiful HD graphics

DOWNLOAD AND MIX IT UP TODAY!
